Title: Silverlight Photo Album
Description: A control for a Photo/Picture Album in Silverlight.

Silverlight Photo Album
A control for a Photo/Picture Album in Silverlight.

Follow me on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/mario_mh

For other Projects please refer to http://sharepointtrench.com/

What is the Silverlight Photo Album?

The Silverlight Photo Album is a Library used to display Photos in Silverlight. It currently contains 2 different Layouts: Horizontal and Vertical. It is designed to be flexible, so there will come much more layouts in the future!

done with silverlight 2

There are currently 3 Types of Albums included:
  • Horizontal Album
  • Vertical Album
  • Grid Album



Get involved! Write me an E-Mail (mario@meirhuber.de) or contact me on Codeplex!
